rukus.text: 77|41|Niscaya muttakira [1] thakabe chayaya o prasrabana bahula sthane
77|43|â€˜Tomadera karmera puraskarasbarupa tomara trptira sathe panahara kara.â€™
77|46|Tomara kha'o ebam bhoga kare na'o alpa kichudina, tomara to aparadhi [1].
77|48|Yakhana taderake bala haya, ruku kara takhana tara ruku kare na [1].
77|50|Kaje'i tara kura'anera paribarte ara kon kathaya imana anabe [1]
